job_description:
Company Description

Athletes Making Progress Together (AMPT) is a sports business group that facilitates high impact events across the country that bridge the gap between professional athletes and the community. These events include charity events, youth camps, golf outings, non-profit fundraisers, and more. For more information, visit us online at www.amptevents.com.

Role Description

This is a part-time remote role for a Corporate Sponsorship Manager. The Corporate Sponsorship Manager will oversee and manage sponsor acquisition for all events. The Corporate Sponsorship Manager will also collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute best-in-class sponsorships/partnerships that result in increased revenue and brand awareness. Commission-based compensation structure for acquiring sponsorships.

Qualifications
• 3+ years of experience in sponsorship management, partnership development, and sponsor acquisition
• Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills
• Strong track record of acquiring successful sponsorships and partnerships
• Experience in nonprofit fundraising and event planning is a plus
• Bachelor's degree or higher in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or a related field
• Ability to work effectively in cross-functional and collaborative teams and to manage multiple projects simultaneously

Qualifications: 3+ years of experience in sponsorship management, partnership development, and sponsor acquisition
